metadata.subject: Louis XIII, King of France, 1601-1643
metadata.title: G.G.R. Theologi ad Ludovicum decimumtertium ... Admonitio fidelissime, humillime, verissime facta, et ex Gallico in Latinum translata : qua breviter et nervose demonstratur, Galliam fœde et turpiter impium fœdus iniisse, et injustum bellum hoc tempore contra Catholicos movisse, salvaque religione prosequi non posse.
metadata.creator: R., G. G.,Theologus.
R., G. G., Theologus
Keller, Jacob, Jesuit
Eudaemon-Joannes, Andreas, Cydonius
Boucher, Jean, approximately 1548-1644, attrib. auth
metadata.description: Variously attributed to J. Keller, A. Eudæmon-Johannes and others
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title and cover page are combined. Damaged, stained, marked, torn and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text.
